title: Excellent Place for Dinner
text: This was a cozy restaurant that was not overly crowded and had an excellent menu. The service was very nice and the live music was very fun to listen to. I would recommend this tavern for people that want a quiet, but lively place to eat.

title: Awesome Dinner and Show
text: The show was fantastic and the food was amazing. Experiencing the traditional dance and song of Greece is one of the best ways to start your trip. There is a limited menu, but overall a great pick for dinner.

title: Amazing site
text: The Acropolis is a must see, obviously. The site was well kept and amazing for pictures! I would recommend the Rick Steves Audio Tour when visiting because it gives such an insight to the place.

title: Great Place to Stay
text: This hotel was at the center of everything our group had planned. The staff was very helpful with money exchange and even opened the breakfast buffet early for us when we had to leave for a tour very early in the morning! Overall, this hotel was amazing and I would recommend it to anyone staying in Athens.
